snippet.title: Cursed Companions Trailer and Gameplay (2025)
snippet.description:
🔥 New trailer for 2025!⭐Wishlist us on Steam ⭐ https://store.steampowered.com/app/3265230/Cursed_Companions/

Cursed Companions is an online co-op horror game where what you say can save or sabotage your team. Say the right words, and you can cast spells or disable traps. Say the wrong words and you and your team mates will get hurt. Go into the dungeons and seek treasure for the Dark Queen. And beware the monsters lurking in the shadows.
